title: Remove my 20 min wait pls riot
body: cant log back in remove my wait period

replies.body:
Hey dude, if you're getting the offline error it's really important that you use the workaround to prevent any further leaves.:

Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Open "LeagueClientSettings.yaml" with notepad
Find the line:

gameflow-patcher-lock:

Delete this whole line
Save the file, restart your LoL Client - and you should be able to log in again.

If you were impacted with a leavebuster as a a result, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll take a look!
